name: Generate Categories

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
    paths-ignore:
      - 'categories/**'

concurrency:
  group: generate-categories
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  generate:
    if: github.actor != 'github-actions[bot]'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Ruby
        uses: ruby/setup-ruby@v1
        with:
          ruby-version: '3.1'

      - name: Run generator
        run: ruby scripts/generate_categories.rb

      - name: Commit changes
        run: |
          git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config user.email "41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          git add categories
          git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "Auto generate categories"
          git push
